parameters.definition: Additional cost for assigning consultant i to project j
Maximum number of projects that can be assigned to a consultant

description: A company has several projects to be done by a fixed number of consultants. Each consultant may be assigned up to a maximum number of projects. Hiring consultants incurs a fixed cost and there is an additional cost incurred for assigning specific consultants to specific projects. Determine the assignment of consultants to projects that minimize the total cost.
